name: Sugar Punch
description: Sugar Punch is a sativa-dominant hybrid bred by Sannie Seeds that crosses Super Silver Haze with The One. These strong, sweet buds offer a mixed aroma of berry and lemon, delivering sedating, dreamy effects. Indoor grows can expect flowers between 9 and 10 weeks.
descriptionPlain: Sugar Punch is a sativa-dominant hybrid bred by Sannie Seeds that crosses Super Silver Haze with The One. These strong, sweet buds offer a mixed aroma of berry and lemon, delivering sedating, dreamy effects. Indoor grows can expect flowers between 9 and 10 weeks.

highlightedReviews.text: Smoked it, vaped it, and ate it. Great all around.
Very sweet and fruity taste. A nice high!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Strawberry Blue, Blackberry Haze, Sugar Punch, Pineapple Skunk, and Hardcore OG
articles.author: Anna Wilcox
articles.text:
Summer may be over, but that doesn't mean an end to fun and fruity summertime flavors. This week's strain alert is packed with some extra tasty treats. From Strawberry Blue to Sugar Punch, these gems all feature incredibly unique and full-bodied aromas, perfect for sneaking in one last taste of those fresh summer flavors. 
Visit the Leafly strain Explorer to write a review or find one of these delicious buds near you!
1. Strawberry Blue
Characteristics of Strawberry Blue:

75/25 sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Strawberry and New Blue
Bred by World of Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Delivers head-heavy, cerebral effects
Indoor and outdoor flowering time of 9 weeks

2. Blackberry Haze
Characteristics of Blackberry Haze:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze
Bred by Nebu Hybridz
Sweet, berry aroma with hints of violet, spice, and cocoa
Brings focused and energetic effects

3. Sugar Punch
Characteristics of Sugar Punch:

Slightly sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross of Super Silver Haze and The One
Bred by Sannie Seeds
Berry and lemon aroma
Has dreamy, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 9-10 weeks

4. Pineapple Skunk
Characteristics of Pineapple Skunk:

Hybrid with slightly indica-dominant effects
Cross between Pineapple, Skunk #1, and Cheese
Bred by Humboldt Seeds
Sweet, pineapple aroma
Delivers mellow, sedative effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 weeks 

5. Hardcore OG
Characteristics of Hardcore OG: 

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Big Bud and DJ Short Blueberry
California-based genetics
Pungent aroma
Brings soothing, sedative effects
High THC

articles.title: New Strains Alert: La Niña, Sugar Punch, Hustler Kush, Ortega, and Monster Cookies
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly strain Explorer is expanding quickly, thanks to your suggestions and feedback! Check out this week's new indica, sativa, and hybrid additions: La Niña, Sugar Punch, Hustler Kush, Ortega, and Monster Cookies.
Visit their strain pages to write a review or to find availability near you!
   La Niña
Characteristics of La Niña:

75/25 sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Haze and White Widow
Breeder: Mr. Nice Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Clear, functional effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 10 weeks

 
   Hustler Kush
Characteristics of Hustler Kush:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Breeder: Greenworks (Seattle, WA).
Sweet, earthy, piney aroma
Fast-acting and long-lasting effects

   Monster Cookies
Characteristics of Monster Cookies:

80/20 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Granddaddy Purple
Earthy, grape, and berry aroma
Delivers a jarring dose of euphoria with full-body relaxation to follow

   Sugar Punch
Characteristics of Sugar Punch:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Super Silver Haze and The One
Breeder: Sannie Seeds
Sweet, berry, and lemon aroma
Sedating, dreamy effects
Indoor flowering time of 9 to 10 weeks

   Ortega
Characteristics of Ortega:

Mostly indica 
Bred from Northern Lights genetics
Sweet, earthy aroma
Heavily tranquilizing
Indoor flowering time of 6 to 8 weeks

growInfo.growNotes:
The denser the grow the longer the vegetation time.
	Up to 600 grams per square meter for indoor grows.
